# +(_:_:)

**Operator**

Concatenates two attributed strings or substrings.

## Declaration

```swift
static func + (lhs: AttributedString, rhs: some AttributedStringProtocol) -> AttributedString
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: An attributed string or substring to concatenate.
- **rhs**: Another attributed string or substring to concatenate.

## Return Value

The result of concatenating `rhs` to the end of `lhs`.

## Combining Attributed Strings

- **append(_:)**: Appends a string to the attributed string.
- **+(_:_:)**: Concatenates two attributed strings.
- **+=(_:_:)**: Appends an attributed string to another attributed string.
- **+=(_:_:)**: Appends an attributed string or substring to another attributed string.

items.description: Appends a string to the attributed string.
items.name: append(_:)

items.description: Appends an attributed string to another attributed string.
